name: SUPER SAILFISH MKII
notes: The successor to the original SAILFISH (first introduced in 1948). The SAILFISH was originally built of plywood and many were sold as kits. A fiberglass SUPER SAILFISH MKII was introduced in 1959 and the original was discontinued shortly afterward. ALCORT produced several hundred SUPER SAILFISH a year but it was soon eclipsed in popularity by the hugely successful SUNFISH, which was first produced in fiberglass at about the same time.
